headline: Ritual Expands Retail Footprint with Clinically-Backed Supplements at Ulta Beauty
summary: Ritual, the women's health brand setting a new standard in the supplement industry with traceable science and traceable sourcing, today announced it has expanded its wholesale retail presence to select Ulta Beauty locations and on ulta.com, featured across The Wellness Shop – the retailer's curated destination for innovative wellness solutions.

content.title: Ritual Expands Retail Footprint with Clinically-Backed Supplements at Ulta Beauty

headline: ARMRA® Announces Nationwide Retail Launch at Ulta Beauty
summary: BONITA SPRINGS, Fla., July 21, 2025--ARMRA®, the physician-founded wellness brand pioneering whole-body vitality through the power of bovine colostrum, has launched at Ulta Beauty in stores nationwide and online, establishing itself as the first colostrum-based ingestible within the retailer’s wellness assortment. This pivotal partnership with the nation’s largest beauty retailer introduces ARMRA® into The Wellness Shop at Ulta Beauty – a curated destination dedicated to self-care and holistic w

headline: MADISON LECROY IS THE FACE OF KRISTIN ESS HAIR'S NEW SUMMER STYLERS COLLECTION
summary: Kristin Ess Hair is proud to announce reality TV star, entrepreneur, and hairstylist, Madison LeCroy, as the face of its highly anticipated Summer 2025 Stylers Collection, launching new and only at Ulta Beauty. Known for her deep roots in the beauty industry, Madison partnered closely with the Kristin Ess Hair's Artistry Team, testing every product and collaborating on the creative direction of the campaign.
